summary: This mod adds new crafting recipes.
descriptionHtml:
|========================|
|
 Improved Crafting	    
|

|by Quality5001/LuigiLP 
|
|========================|



Description:

This mod will add new crafting recipes.
 Now it just contains crafting recipes for the pickaxe, 
the woodcutter axe and charcoal (cookpot/smelter).
 New recipes will be add in the future.



How you can craft the "Improved Crafting"-Items:

At the perktree for smithing, there a new point with the name "Improved Crafting". 
It requires a smithing-
knowledge from 5. Now it's a condition for the "Arcane Blacksmith".



Crafting Recipes:



Woodcutter axe:

2 Firewood

3 Iron ingots



Pickaxe:

2 Firewood

3 Iron ingots



Charcoal (Smelter):

1 Firewood (give you 8 charcoal)



Charcoal (Cooking pot)

1 Firewood (give you 3 charcoal)


v02:
-Add Improvements
 Pickaxe and wooodcutter's Axe: 1 Iron Ingot

-Add Scimitar
 3 Steel Ingots
 2 Leather Strips
  Improve: 1 Steel Ingot

-Add Shiv
 1 Iron Ingot
 1 Leather Strip
  Improve: 1 Iron Ingot



Installation:
Put the Data-Folder in your Skyrim Folder.  
Normally it is located in 
"C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrim"

Credits:
All stuff was created by Quality5001/LuigiLP

Also you can download it on ModDB:
Will ADD
author: Quality5001
